name: rbk_events
description: A modern PHP-based website for RBK Events, featuring dynamic routing, responsive design, and multiple page templates.

scripts.watch: sass --watch assets/scss/not-found-page.scss assets/css/not-found-page.css --style=compressed --no-source-map & sass --watch assets/scss/home-page.scss assets/css/home-page.css --style=compressed --no-source-map & sass --watch assets/scss/about-page.scss assets/css/about-page.css --style=compressed --no-source-map & sass --watch assets/scss/offer-page.scss assets/css/offer-page.css --style=compressed --no-source-map & sass --watch assets/scss/offer-nav-page.scss assets/css/offer-nav-page.css --style=compressed --no-source-map & sass --watch assets/scss/media-page.scss assets/css/media-page.css --style=compressed --no-source-map
